get.description:
List all accounts created by the current user.
    - Supports pagination
    - Supports filtering and sorting
    - Returns managed accounts based on user type
    - Includes parent account details for hierarchy

parameters.name: filter

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific account

patch.description:
Update an existing account.
    - Validates account name uniqueness
    - Updates modifiedBy and modifiedAt
    - Maintains account hierarchy

post.description:
Create a new child account under the current user account.
    - Validates account name uniqueness
    - Sets up parent-child relationship
    - Inherits currency and timezone from parent
    - Updates managed accounts cache

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of users.
    - Supports filtering and sorting
    - Includes role information
    - Supports search by name
    - Returns active users by default

200.description: List of users with pagination metadata

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific user

Invalid input data or user not found

get.description:
Retrieve all system modules and their capabilities.
    - Returns complete module hierarchy
    - Includes all available capabilities
    - Used for role management
    - Required for permission setup

200.description: List of modules with their capabilities

get.description:
Retrieve paginated list of roles.
    - Includes role capabilities
    - Supports filtering and sorting
    - Returns active roles by default
    - Supports search by role name

parameters.name: filter

get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific role.
    - Includes all role capabilities
    - Shows permission settings
    - Validates role access

post.description:
Create a new role with capabilities.
    - Assigns role capabilities
    - Validates role name uniqueness
    - Creates role-capability mappings
    - Maintains creation audit

patch.description:
Update an existing role.
    - Updates role details
    - Modifies capabilities
    - Maintains update history
    - Validates role access
